titleStmt.title: Safe conduct, or The saints guidance to glory. Opened in a sermon preached at Dunstans in the East London. November the second, MDCLIV. At the funerall of the vertuous and religious gentlewoman, Mris. Thomasin Barnardiston, late wife of Mr. Samuel Barnardiston, merchant. / By Ralph Robinson, pastor of Mary Wolnoth, Lumbardstreet, London.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, Ralph, 1614-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.I. for Stephen Bowtell at the signe of the Bible in Popes-head Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in Popes-head Alley.
